entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate time-to-first-query and per-query in Blazor WASM with Sqlite #26949
  • Migrating from .NET5 to .NET6 throws PlatformNotSupported_DataSqlClient exception on startup in linux #26948
  • EF Core Migration Bundles: no way to passthrough custom args to generated efbundle #26945
  • Better translation for COUNT with predicate checking for non-null #26940
  • Count over column projection after GroupBy yields wrong results #26938
  • New entity is not saved under certain conditions #26937

Closed

  • Where_TimeOnly_subtract_TimeOnly using TimeOnlyTypeMapping for TimeSpan constant #26864
  • Unexpected slow response #26944
  • Code inheritance without database inheritance #26741
  • EF generates invalid SQL when using enums in projections #26472
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect query generated when using Skip and Enum Where condition when Skip value is same as enum value #22524
    7.0.0
  • Query: Deal with same querycontext parameter having multiple inferred type mapping #19503
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Static analysis: make members static #26947
  • Static analysis: minor small changes #26946
  • [6.0.2] Call sync connection close instead of async #26943
  • Call sync connection close instead of async (7.0) #26942
  • Add regression tests for Count after GroupBy #26939
  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936
  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935

Merged

  • Static analysis: remove redundant nullable warning suppression #26941
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26933
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26932
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26931
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Add multiple parameters if inferred type mapping differs #26582
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Fixup navigations to/from join entity when new many-to-many relationship is created #26853
  • [6.0.2] Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are generated #26617
    Servicing-consider
